## VectorDirection enum

The directions the vector can travel across the matrix (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum VectorDirection 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  X | <code>0</code> | In the X axis (left / right) |
|  Y | <code>1</code> | In the Y axis (up / down) |
